Flash
When Snipcaster Mage enters, you may exile an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard.
{U}: Until end of turn, you may cast a card exiled with Snipcaster Mage. If that spell would be put into a graveyard, exile it instead. [i](You still pay its costs. Timing rules still apply.)[/i]
notes:
New card — Replaced Savor the Flavor

Savor the Flavor is a sweet card, but it’s very similar to blue’s mythic recipe, and I’d rather keep the recipe than Savor.
